# showsScopeBar

**Instance Property**

Specifies whether the scope bar is displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsScopeBar: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the search bar is owned by a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchController], then setting this property implicitly sets the search controller’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchController/automaticallyShowsScopeBar] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring scope bar buttons

- **scopeButtonTitles**: An array of strings indicating the titles of the scope buttons.
- **selectedScopeButtonIndex**: The index of the selected scope button.
- **setShowsScope(_:animated:)**: Specifies whether the scope bar is displayed, optionally using an animation.
